title: Vigiloo
body: .NET project for logistics management. Completed 2 API integrations and modeled data for complex Web App. This project involved working closely with the client to understand their specific requirements and deliver a scalable solution.

title: Gamarra
body: Landing page for a personal trainer. Built using Bootstrap and SASS for styles and applying responsive design principles. The page includes a contact form for potential clients.

title: Hypestore
body: Front-end design-oriented E-commerce template built using React and ChakraUI. This project focused on creating a user-friendly interface with smooth animations to enhance the shopping experience.

title: Mymtec
body: Reforming a 2006 foreign trade system using modern .NET and SPA architecture with advanced performance techniques. This project aimed to streamline processes, improve user experience, and enhance overall efficiency.

title: Halo
body: Landing page for Halo, a cannabis dispensary. Built with design principles in mind and hand-made requirements.

title: FireUp
body: Landing page for an up and coming marketing agency. Built using React and Tailwind.

title: Manjar2Go
body: Landing page for a Food App from Puerto Rico. Built using React, Tailwind and Framer Motion.

title: Sprintify
body: FullStack App designed to guide projects and tasks for a team of developers, B2B oriented. Built with React and NextJS
